attributes.additional_details:
Residential areas are plagued by the practice of van drivers of commercial vehicles bringing their vans home and parking them overnight in residential streets.  I believe these vans should be parked at the depots of their employers as the vans are an eyesore, especially if there are several together.

I would like the Government to stop this practice of commercial vehicles parking overnight in residential areas - usually NOT outside their own houses usually outside someone else's - causing conflict.
